Architectures

Boost.Context supports following architectures:

Table 1.2. Supported architectures (<ABI|binary format>)

Architecture

LINUX (UNIX)

Windows

MacOS X

iOS

arm

AAPCS|ELF

AAPCS|PE

-

AAPCS|MACH-O

i386

SYSV|ELF

MS|PE

SYSV|MACH-O

-

mips1

O32|ELF

-

-

-

-

SYSV|MACH-O

-

SYSV|ELF,XCOFF

-
